titleStmt.title: Sol in ascendente, or, The glorious appearance of Charles the Second, upon the horizon of London, in her horoscopicall sign, Gemini
titleStmt.author: Ashmole, Elias, 1617-1692.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Elias Ashmole. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
